metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14333 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The process_version_sections function in readelf.c in GNU Binutils 2.29allows attackers to cause a denial of service (Integer Overflow, and hangbecause of a time-consuming loop) or possibly have unspecified other impactvia a crafted binary file with invalid values of ent.vn_next, during"readelf -a" execution.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
